statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ISNULL(M1.SORT_SEQ, 99999), PP.PRODUCT_TYPE, ISNULL(M2.SORT_SEQ, 99999), PP.CATEGORY, PP.PRODUCT_NAME, PP.PRODUCT_CODE) AS ROW_NO , ISNULL(M1.NAME, PP.PRODUCT_TYPE) AS PRODUCT_TYPE , ISNULL(M2.NAME, PP.CATEGORY) AS CATEGORY , AA.PRODUCT_ID AS PRODUCT_ID , PP.PRODUCT_CODE AS PRODUCT_CODE , PP.PRODUCT_NAME AS PRODUCT_NAME , M3.NAME AS PRODUCT_UNIT , AA.BASE_QTY , AA.BASE_AMT , AA.PURC_QTY , AA.PURC_AMT , AA.PROD_QTY , AA.PROD_AMT , AA.TSUM_QTY , AA.TSUM_AMT , AA.COST_PRICE , AA.REMARKS , dbo.DateTimeToChar20(AA.INS_TIME) AS INS_TIME , AA.INS_USER , U1.USER_NAME AS INS_USER_NAME , dbo.DateTimeToChar20(AA.UPD_TIME) AS UPD_TIME , AA.UPD_USER , U2.USER_NAME AS UPD_USER_NAME FROM UCD.COST_PRICE AA WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN UCD.PRODUCTS PP WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.PRODUCT_ID = PP.PRODUCT_ID LEFT JOIN UAA.CODES M1 ON PP.PRODUCT_TYPE = M1.CODE AND M1.PARENT_CODE = 'PRODUCT_TYPE' LEFT JOIN UAA.CODES M2 ON PP.CATEGORY = M2.CODE AND M2.PARENT_CODE = 'CATEGORY' LEFT JOIN UAA.CODES M3 ON PP.UNIT_TYPE = M3.CODE AND M3.PARENT_CODE = 'UNIT_TYPE' LEFT JOIN UAA.USERS U1 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.INS_USER = U1.USER_ID LEFT JOIN UAA.USERS U2 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.UPD_USER = U2.USER_ID WHERE AA.CLOSING_YM = #CLOSING_YM#
AND PP.PRODUCT_TYPE = #PRODUCT_TYPE#
AND PP.CATEGORY = #CATEGORY#
AND AA.PRODUCT_ID = #PRODUCT_ID#
ORDER BY ROW_NO
statements.insert: INSERT INTO UCD.COST_PRICE ( CLOSING_YM, PRODUCT_ID, BASE_QTY, BASE_AMT, PURC_QTY, PURC_AMT, TSUM_QTY, TSUM_AMT, COST_PRICE, REMARKS, INS_TIME, INS_USER ) VALUES ( #CLOSING_YM#, #PRODUCT_ID#, #BASE_QTY#, #BASE_AMT#, #PURC_QTY#, #PURC_AMT#, #TSUM_QTY#, #TSUM_AMT#, #COST_PRICE#, #REMARKS#, GETDATE(), #INS_USER# )
statements.update: UPDATE UCD.COST_PRICE SET BASE_QTY = #BASE_QTY# , BASE_AMT = #BASE_AMT# , PURC_QTY = #PURC_QTY# , PURC_AMT = #PURC_AMT# , TSUM_QTY = #TSUM_QTY# , TSUM_AMT = #TSUM_AMT# , COST_PRICE = #COST_PRICE# , REMARKS = #REMARKS# , UPD_TIME = GETDATE() , UPD_USER = #INS_USER# WHERE CLOSING_YM = #CLOSING_YM# AND PRODUCT_ID = #PRODUCT_ID#
statements.delete: DELETE FROM UCD.COST_PRICE WHERE CLOSING_YM = #CLOSING_YM# AND PRODUCT_ID = #PRODUCT_ID#
